version_description: Official support for Chat on Synology NAS.

1. Fixed an issue where some strings are not properly translated.
2. Usability enhancements.

1. Supports external users to sign in Chat with guest accounts to join the discussions.
2. Added a newly designed tool bar for uploading photos, videos, and files.
3. Added a new section in the channel list, allowing unread messages to be easily checked.
4. Supports setting a daily snooze schedule.
5. Supports promoting personal conversations to private channels.
6. Supports pinning posts to the top of the post list.
7. Supports setting passcode for data protection (Fingerprint scanner supported).
8. Supports sending messages by pressing the Enter button, making message sending easy when using a bluetooth keyboard.
9. Supports hiding the conversations that have been idle for a long time when the conversation list is too long.
10. Supports regenerating or renewing the private keys for encrypted channels if unfortunately the passphrase is lost or for security concern.
11. Fixed the security vulnerability of SSRF.
12. Enhanced user interface performance.
13. Minor bug fixes.

1. Supports browsing multiple pictures by swiping the screen in non-encrypted channels and conversations
2. Supports archiving the existing messages before inviting new members to join a private channel
3. Supports archiving messages when a channel or conversation is closed
4. Supports video streaming and playback when using HTTP connection or when connecting to a server with trusted certificate via HTTPS
5. Minor bug fixes

The following features require Chat 2.0.0
1. Supports poll creation to timely collect feedback from the members in a channel or conversation
2. Supports message scheduling to automatically send messages on the scheduled time
3. Supports message forwarding to effortlessly forward messages to one or multiple channels and conversations
4. Supports message reminders, allowing you to receive push notifications on important messages at specific time
5. Supports message threads, allowing you to directly comment on specific messages and receive notifications on the latest updates in the subscribed and joined threads
6. Supports Google Safe Browsing to automatically check the safety of the posted URLs and trigger warnings for unsafe URLs
